DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the prevalence of vitamin D deficiency among the population of pregnant women receiving prenatal care and giving birth at the investigators' clinic. The further purposes are to identify the population at risk for vitamin D deficiency and to analyse whether vitamin D deficiency is associated with pregnancy complications.
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence and Consequences of Vitamin D Deficiency in Pregnant Women in Switzerland
DOC.criteria: Pregnant women attending prenatal care at our clinic who had a vitamin D bloodtesting at admission Pregnant women lost to followup, Birth outside our clinic
